message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $20,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. That's the highest I'm willing to go.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but the product's value is truly much higher. Could you meet me halfway at $17,000?
I appreciate your understanding of my budget constraints, but I'm still a bit above my limit. How about $13,500? I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer.
